Reviews.Title: Worthless
Reviews.Author: RB
Reviews.Content: I can't help but wonder what the first reviewer here means by "works good". This is horrible and worthless. If you turn the volume up enough to make a difference, you get echoes and feedback. Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: customer007 "customer007"
Reviews.Content: Pros:- Works good- simple to useCons:- The person for whom I am buying this is hard of hearing. We need to shout in his presence so he can hear. The aplification it provides might fall short a wee bit. However, I tried a few other productions and this is pretty much the level they all are at. I also purchased 'Ameriphone HA40 In-Line Telephone Handset Amplifier' and am hoping the combination will work fine

Reviews.Title: Works only with corded phones!
Reviews.Author: A. Butler "Prettypretty"
Reviews.Content: Bought one of these for cordless home system with five phones. It didn't work on any of them. Contacted vendor, they have fabulous customer service! Even sent a replacement. Both only crackled and hummed. Couldn't hear anything. I didn't bother to return either item. Discovered that they work okay with CORDED phones only! So buy them only for those. They do not work with cellular or wireless.

Reviews.Title: Amplifier
Reviews.Author: Old Fixit Dog
Reviews.Content: I've been wearing a hearing aid for 32 years and using a product similar to the one in question for telephone assist. Thought I'd just get a new one for "back-up." This one was a BAD choice. First, the "supplied" battery was dead and corroded. New battery lets it do a good job of amplifying "noise", but nothing helpful to me. Fortunately, I didn't pay much for it, and I can afford to throw it away with no further hassle with returns, etc.

Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: Ulie "Ulie"
Reviews.Content: from overseas/very difficult to use/static comes and goes as it moves on receiver.you have rubber band that comes with it and you have to put on every time you use it.  it is better than having nothing at all-but i dont think it will last very long!

Reviews.Title: did not work as advertised
Reviews.Author: roberet lesperance
Reviews.Content: was very disappointed in this item, and would not recommend it for anyone  not even for a toy ty but just another piece of junk

Reviews.Title: thums down
Reviews.Author: harv
Reviews.Content: Ibought 4 of these phone amps and I must say  I have never bought a worse poductnot worth returning byer beware harvey crawfordi

Reviews.Title: amplifier helpful
Reviews.Author: Paulette George
Reviews.Content: My mom & I are both hard of hearing.  I bought each of of us one.  I have used mine a few times and found it somewhat helpful.  Mom hasn't used hers yet.  It would be more helpful if it turned off and on as needed.  Mom is 98 years old and forgetful.

Reviews.Title: phone amplifierthis item worked as intended
Reviews.Author: Greyhorse
Reviews.Content: this item worked as intended but to hard to handle as far as i'm concerned . hard to stay on phone if you have to move around to type or write .

Reviews.Title: Loud buzzing
Reviews.Author: Anne Chaney
Reviews.Content: Was not compatible with my wireless phoneas advertised.Would not recommend for a wireless phonesystem. It did not meet my needs.AC

ProductInfo.Features:
Features include: Increases the volume of any telephone handset Works with cellular or regular phones
Easy to use Easy to carry along for travel Stop straining to hear others talking to you on the phone
Dimensions: 1.25 x 2.375 x 2 inches Battery included Include retail packaging
ProductInfo.Name: Telepal 72-20690 Mini Telephone Amplifier
